https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kb2dqj73cfmt6qHAh1ySIlVm6v0.jpg Spanning several decades, this powerful biopic offers a glimpse into the life of famed Cuban poet and novelist Reinaldo Arenas, an artist who was vilified for his homosexuality in Fidel Castro's Cuba. Before Night Falls
